title: First OWASP Halifax Social
location: 5440 Spring Garden Rd, Halifax, NS B3J 1E9
description: We will be meeting at the Pavia inside the Halifax Central Library to see who is interested and to socalize about all things Web Application Security! https://www.meetup.com/OWASP-Halifax/events/250490854/

title: OWASP Top 10 with Remediation and Intro to Burpsuite
description: Learn what the OWASP (Open Web Application Security Project) is about, how to remediate the OWASP Top 10 and fire up Burpsuite to find flaws in your web applications. https://www.meetup.com/OWASP-Halifax/events/252705971/
